channel.title: Montmorency Falls on Yen's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Montmorency Falls on Yen's blog

item.title: Québec, 2-July
item.description: At breakfast we ran into another Belgian couple, this time from Antwerp. They were on a tour of Ontario and Québec. They were quite excited about a free outdoor performance of the Cirque de Soleil. Sophie, who made us breakfast, also told us about the Moulin de l’Images, which was some sort of projection. We’d have to check both of them out. We escaped from warm and muggy Boston to somewhat warm and muggy Québec.

item.title: Québec, 3-July
item.description: We had our fill of the city yesterday, so it seemed like time to head out to the country. We also learned that William and Kate would be in town as part of their Canada tour, an event undoubtedly to be attended by legions of their admirers and non-admirers alike. That cemented the decision for us. First stop is the Montmorency Falls. At 84 meters, it’s higher than Niagara Falls.
